original_text: And Solomon overlaid the inside of the house with pure gold, and he drew chains of gold across, in front of the inner sanctuary, and overlaid it with gold.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 정금으로 외소 안에 입히고 내소 앞에 금사슬로 건너지르고 내소를 금으로 입히고

sentences.original_text: And Solomon overlaid the inside of the house with pure gold
and he drew chains of gold across
in front of the inner sanctuary
